messages.content: What is a good way to break down the word "unprepossessing" to more understand its meaning?

Unprepossessing, as a word, is combining the prefix "un-" with the root word "prepossessing," which means showing or seeming to be a person of good character or good appearance.
So, in essence, unprepossessing means lacking good character or good appearance.
What is a good way to break down the word "prepossessing" to more understand its meaning?

Prepossessing, as a word, is combining the prefix "pre-" with the root word "possessing," which means showing or seeming to be a person of good character or good appearance.
So, in essence, prepossessing means showing or seeming to be a person of good character or good appearance.
